channel.title: Microsoft 365 on Microsoft 365 Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft 365 on Microsoft 365 Community Blog

item.title: Looking at things in profile
item.description: User Profiles are an increasingly important part of a modern organisation While they have always been important as a (often underused) tool for finding staff and searching for people with certain skills, the changes in work practice wrought by the COVID-19 pandemic now mean that staff spend less time together physically, so have less opportunity to know their colleagues and create the social and personal links that team-building and socialisation rely on.

item.title: Explore Microsoft 365 extensibility opportunities with the Microsoft 365 Extensibility look book
item.description: Want to understand what types of apps you can build on Microsoft 365?

item.title: What kind of apps can you build on Microsoft 365?
item.description: Microsoft 365 is a rich platform for building applications. Here are the types of apps you can build on Microsoft 365.

item.title: How to enhance your "dev tenant" to unleash the full potential of the Power Platform
item.description: The Microsoft 365Â Developer tenant is an amazing feature to learn and experiment in the Microsoft 365 universe (actually I’m talking about your personal development “sandbox” of the Microsoft 365 developer program.
